715928f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Delancey Street
715928f-a.text:
120 Allen Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of Delancey Street.
April 7, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
715928f-a.folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY

719266f-a.title: Manhattan: Delancey Street - Allen Street
719266f-a.text:
Delancey Street, at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Allen Street.
Also shown is Allen Street, east side, north from Delancey Street.
April 5, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
719266f-a.folder: Delancey Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY

715930f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Delancey Street
715930f-a.text:
Allen Street, north from Delancey Street,showing
the longitudinal park that separates north (right) and south
bound port'ons of this thoroughfare. The latter is the old
Street while the formor and the park are newly constructed.
Note the 2nd Ave. "El" line and its Rivington Street station.
These formerly darkened both sides of Allen Street and practi-
cally prohibited penetration.
March 1929
Eugene L. Armbruster
715930f-a.folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY

715925f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Delancey Street
715925f-a.text:
Allen Street, east side, from Delancey to Broome Streets,
looking across the clearing on the west side of Allen Street.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
715925f-a.folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY

April 1, 1934.

P. L. Sperr.

715927f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Delancey Street
715927f-a.text:
No. 99 Allen Street, west side, south of Delancey Street, showing
a store selling antique brass wares.
About 1936.
Gift of Dr. Michael Wishengrad A.R.P.S.
715927f-a.folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY

715929f-a.title: Manhattan: Delancey Street - Allen Street
715929f-a.text:
Steel work on "L" across Delancey St., Allen St.
Aug. 25, 1942
P. L. Sperr, Photographer

715931f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Delancey Street
715931f-a.text:
Allen Street, east side, between Delancey and Rivington Streets,
showing demolition of buildings.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
715931f-a.folder: Allen Street & Delancey Street, Manhattan, NY

719265f-a.title: Manhattan: Delancey Street - Allen Street
719265f-a.text:
Delancey Street, at the N.E. corner of Allen Street. Building
shown is being demolished to widen Allen Street.
January 21, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
719265f-a.folder: Delancey Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY

and Delancey Streets.
September 24, 1930.
